message: Hey everyone, I took the rooftop garden down last week, and need to find a home for two blueberry bushes and one golden raspberry bush. If anyone would like them, please let me know.
does your taking them down imply they can be housed indoors only for the winter?
I can give them a good home. We just built a perfect space for fruit bushes in my front yard.
They are definitely outdoor plants, and I believe could be left outdoors for the winter. Right now, they're in 5 gallon buckets, so they could be put into a garage or something for the winter.

fil, I assume that means that you wouldn't be able to take them. aj, when's the next time you're going to be in the lab? I'm thinking I can just leave them in the bathroom of the lab in the next day or two.
if there are any blueberry plants left I can put one on my balcony
I can be in the lab tomorrow to pick them up. I'll leave a blueberry bush for RMD6502
ok, I'll be there tomorrow around 7:30. Unfortunately, I think blueberry plants aren't self-pollinating- ie, you need two.
*if MY code # still works, that is
Looks like I'll have to work late tonight. I can't get to the lab until around 930pm... too late? I can handle getting in and out by myself if you code # still works.
